title.rendered: Signature Kitchens & Baths Features Eldorado Stone for Outdoor Room Enjoyment

content.rendered: Both Eldorado Stone’s Marbella and Infinite Artisan Fire Bowls are sizzling in the Summer 2013 issue of Signature Kitchens & Baths magazine! Described as “more than just a pretty face,” the Fire Bowls are on trend with today’s popular outdoor room!
